loop-tracking-category-error: Name of the LOOP default error tracking category

specialpages-group-loop: name of the special pages category for loop
loopstructure-specialpage-title: Page title for LOOP Structure special page
loopstructure-edit-specialpage-title: Page title for editing Loop Structure special page
loopstructure: Name of the LOOP structure special page in special:specialpages
loopstructureedit: Name of editing the LOOP structure special page in special:specialpages
loop-token-error: Error message when the users edit token is invalid
loop-permission-error: Error message, user has no permission
loopstructure-save-equal-error: Error message when the user saves a unchanged structure
loopstructure-save-parsed-structure-erro: Error message occurs when the parsed structure content is empty
loopstructure-save-parse-error: Parse error for the LOOP strucutre
loopstructure-save-dublicates-error: Error message occurs when there are dublicate entries in structure.
loopstructure-save-success: Saving succes of the LOOP structure
loopsettings: Name of the LOOP settings special page in special:loopsettings
loopsettings-specialpage-title: Page title for LOOP Settings special page
loopsettings-no-permission: Error message, user has no permission to view this page
loopsettings-use-cc-label: Label for option to use Creative Commons license checkbox
loopsettings-imprint-label: Label for imprint page input field
loopsettings-privacy-label: Label for privacy page input field
loopsettings-extra-footer-linktext: Link text for link to extra footer page
extraFooter: Placeholder text for automatically generated MediaWiki:ExtraFooter page.
loopsettings-link-icon-label: Label for social icon input fields
loopsettings-upload-hint: Hint for users to inform about the ability to use previously and newly uploaded files.
loopsettings-customlogo-hint: Hint for custom logo input field
loopsettings-customlogo-editablestyles: Tooltip for the info that the given logo will only be displayed in some skin styles ($1)
loopsettings-error-customlogo-notfound: Error message, given filename not uploaded / found
loopsettings-headline-extrafooter: Headline on settings page, extra footer
loopsettings-headline-footer-links: Headline on settings page, footer links
loopsettings-headline-skinstyle: Headline on settings page, skin style
loopsettings-tab-general: Tab name on settings page, general
loopsettings-tab-footer: Tab name on settings page, footer
loopsettings-tab-appearance: Tab name on settings page, appearance
loopsettings-tab-advanced: Tab name on settings page, advanced
loopsettings-url-imprint-privacy-hint: Hint for imprint and privacy input field. URL required or page title in LOOP
loopsettings-error: Error message after server-side validation failing
loopsettings-tab-content: Tab name on settings page, content settings

loopsettings-numbering-type-ongoing-labe: Label for type of numbering radio button - ongoing numbering

loopsettings-citation-style: Headline on settings page, Citation style
extraSidebar: Placeholder text for automatically generated MediaWiki:ExtraSidebar page.
loopsettings-extra-sidebar-linktext: Link text for link to extra sidebar page
loopsettings-headline-bugreport: Headline on settings page, bug report
loopsettings-bugreport-email-label: Description for e-mail field for bug reports. No entered email will disable the bug report service.
loopsettings-headline-objects: Headline on settings page, Object markings

loopsettings-renderobjects: Headline on settings page, display of object markings
loopsettings-render-objects-marked-label: Label for setting. All Elements of objects displayed

loopsettings-render-objects-none-label: Label for setting. All Elements hidden
loopsettings-export-t2s-label: offer text to speech on pages
loopsettings-export-scorm-label: offer Scorm for download (only for permitted users)
loopsettings-export-xml-label: offer XML for download (only for permitted users)
loopsettings-export-html-label: offer offline version for download (only for permitted users)
loopsettings-captcha-nokeys: Captchas are deactivated as the configuration is not complete.
loopsettings-captcha-desc: Please note that your privacy page needs some extension upon activating captchas.
loopsettings-captcha-usergroup: Only for self-registered users in an open LOOP
loopsettings-captcha-edit-label: ... triggered on every attempted page save
loopsettings-captcha-addurl-label: ... triggered on a page save that would add one or more URLs to the page
loopsettings-captcha-createaccount-label: ... triggered on creation of a new account
loopsettings-captcha-badlogin-label: ... triggered on the next login attempt after a failed one.
loopsettings-captcha-bugreport-label: ... triggered on the bug report page
loopsettings-feedback-level-module: Collect for the LOOP as a whole
loopsettings-rss-text: Tell the people where to put the link below, their rss reader.

loopexport: Name of Specialpage Export in List of Specialpages
loopexport-audio-chapter: Word before chapter number in audio file titles and filenames for export

loopliterature-error-dublicate-id: Error Message rendered when Object has a dublicate ID: $1 -> given ID; $2 -> Page where the original ID is used; $3 -> Key/Term of the original object
looplegacy-error-unsupported: General error message for deprecated functions. $1 -> The deprecated tag; $2 -> Since when the tag is deprecated.
looplegacy-biblio: Special error message for biblio tag which has been deprecated in LOOP2 and replaced by loop_literature tag.
looplegacy-references: Special error message for references tag is been obsolte since LOOP2.
loopobject-error-unknown-id: Error Message rendered when Object has an ID that's not in DB: $1 -> given ID;
loopobject-error-dublicate-id: Error Message rendered when Object has a dublicate ID: $1 -> given ID; $2 -> Page where the original ID is used
loopobject-error-unknown: Error message for unknown errors in the object numbering process
loopreference-error-unknown-refid:
Error Message rendered when id option is unknown.

Parameters:
* $1 - given id
loopreference-error-no-refid: Error Message rendered when no id is given
loop-glossary-objectnumber-prefix: prefix for LOOP object names in glossary
loop-glossary-empty: Shown message on Glossary special page when there is no glossary entry.
loopglossary-alert-saved: The glossary page [[Glossary:$1|$1]] was saved! You can edit the page now.
loopindex-error-dublicate-id: Error Message rendered when Object has a dublicate ID: $1 -> given ID; $2 -> Page where the original ID is used; $3 -> Key/Term of the original object
loopwikieditor-loop-areas: Wikieditor LOOP section: Label for dropdown - Areas
loopwikieditor-loop-object: Wikieditor LOOP section: Label for dropdown - Objects
loopwikieditor-loop-object-media-dragdro: Wikieditor LOOP : Media type Drag & Drop
loopwikieditor-loop-area-area: Wikieditor LOOP : Area type No Icon
loopwikieditor-loop-snippets: Wikieditor LOOP section: Label for dropdown - Templates
loopwikieditor-loop-contents: Wikieditor LOOP section: Label for dropdown - Media
loopsidebar-error-notfound: Error message for non-existent page given in loop_sidebar tag
loopsidebar-error-nopage: Error message for non-existent page parameter.
loopzip-error-nostartfile: Error message when loop_zip misses file given in the parameter start ($1) which is supposed to be in ZIP file ($2)
loopzip-error-noextraction: Error message when loop_zip can't find the extracted zip folder. Zip extraction is blocked when a php file is detected within the zip.
loop-error-missingrequired: General Error message for missing required parameters. $1 -> the tag that has a missing parameter; $2 -> The parameter that is missing. The element will not be displayed when this message is set.
loop-error-missingfile: Error message for files that are not uploaded to the system. $1 -> the tag that has a missing file; $2 -> The given file name that could not be found; $3{{Plural|The element is displayed anyway.|The element can't be displayed without the file.}}
loop-error-unknown-param: General Error message for unknown parameters entered in a tag. $1 -> the tag that has an unknown parameter; $2 -> The unknown parameter name; $3 -> The unknown value of that parameter; $4 -> Allowed values; $5 -> the given default for that tag;
loopterminology: Special Page title of terminology/abbreviations page
loopterminologyedit: Special Page title of terminology/abbreviations edit page
loopterminology-warning-deleted: Feedback message for deleting all abbreviations
loopterminology-save-success: Feedback message for successful updating of abbreviations.
loopterminology-hint: Page description at the top of the terminology edit page
loopterminology-example: Formatting information for the abbreviations edit page
loopbugreport: Special page title for bug reports
loopbugreport-specialpage-title: Special page title for bug reports
loopbugreport-message-label: Bug report field label for bug description
loopbugreport-page-label: ug report field label for page that has the bug
loopbugreport-send: Button label for sending a message
loopbugreport-email-subject: Email subject of a bug report. $1 is the domain; $2 is a ticket number
loopbugreport-email: Email text for the person who receives bug reports. $1 is the url to the LOOP; $2 is the bug reporter's email address; $3 is the page the bug is on; $4 is the error message
loopbugreport-success: Success message after sending a bug report
loopbugreport-error-configuration: info that the bug report function is not active yet
loopbugreport-error-nodata: the page has not been accessed through the UI link
loopbugreport-fail: Failure message after sending a bug report.
loopfeedback-rating-descr-module: How satisfied were you generally with these contents?
loopfeedback-rating-descr-chapter: How satisfied were you with the contents of this chapter?
loopfeedback-specialpage-feedback-for-ch: Feedback for the contents of this chapter
loopfeedback-specialpage-feedback-for-mo: Feedback for the contents of this LOOP
loopfeedback-specialpage-rating-descr: How satisfied were you with these contents?
loopfeedback-specialpage-confirm-reset-p: Do you really want to reset feedback of "$1"?
loopfeedback-specialpage-confirm-reset-a: Do you really want to reset all feedbacks?
loopfeedback-specialpage-inactive: No feedback is collected at this point.
loopfeedback-specialpage-reset-info: * Resetting feedbacks should only be done after making some general changes to the contents.
loopfeedback-already-done: You already gave us feedback. Thank you!
loopconsent-text: Message on consent prompt for e.g. youtube videos.
loopngspice-label-send: Button text for starting ng spice simulations
loopngspice-error-no-service: Message when NgSpice is not configured
loopngspice-error-min-value: Message for user when not meeting the minimum value
loopngspice-error-max-value: Message for user when not meeting the maximum value
looppagesnotinstructure: Special page title for list of pages that are not in TOC
loopupdater-description-update: Descriptive message of MediaWiki Updates shown on special page to do so
loopupdater-warning-update: A confirmation of the user that they made backups of the loop before executing the update
loopsearch: Special page title for wiki text search
loopsearch-description: Description of Wikitext search special page
loopsearch-results: Result message for special page. $1 -> search term
loop-maintenance: Maintenance mode message. $1 -> string given in wgReadOnly variable.
